titleStmt.title: The cronycle of all the kynges: that haue reygned in Englande: sythe the Conquest of Wyllyam Conqueroure And sheweth the dayes of theyr crownacion. And howe many yeres they dyd reygne. With the dayes of theyr death. And wher they were buryed.
titleStmt.author: Lydgate, John, 1370?-1451?

notesStmt.note: Only known copy lacks all but first sheet.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
